    • kmpAlgorithm

      public String kmpAlgorithm(String text, String search)
      Method that develops the search by the KMP algorithm
      Parameters:
      text - String of the file imported
      search - String of the character(s) that will be finded
      Returns:
      String of the character(s) that the user searched

    • kmp

      public int kmp(String text, String search, int[] nums, int index)
      Method that searches the position of the character(s) requiered by the user
      Parameters:
      text - String of the file imported
      search - String of the character(s) that will be finded
      nums - Unidimensional array that contains the positions of the searches
      index - Initial position to make the search
      Returns:
      Integer of the position of what the user searched

    • bm

      public int bm(String text, String search, int[] chars, int index)
      Method that searches the position of the character(s) requiered by the user
      Parameters:
      text - String of the file imported
      search - String of the character(s) that will be finded
      chars - Unidimensional array that contains the positions of the searches
      index - Initial position to make the search
      Returns:
      Integer of the position of what the user searched

    • setValues

      public void setValues(String text, int[] chars)
      Method that determines which character(s) are inside the search, based on the characters in the ASCII table. In order to take them into account when performing the search
      Parameters:
      text - String with the search that will be done
      chars - Unidimensional array which contains the indices of the matches

    • nextPosition

      public int[] nextPosition(String content, int[] nums)
      Method that modifies the initial positions of the characters, in case there are repeated cases inside the initial search
      Parameters:
      content - String of the search that will be done
      nums - Unidimensional array of the search length
      Returns:
      The modified position
